Text.Name: Bed
Text.Desc: A single bed that can provide you with a good night's sleep.

Text.Name: DoubleBed
Text.Desc: A double bed suitable for two people.

Text.Name: SmallTable
Text.Desc: A simple table for people to have meals at.

Text.Name: Table
Text.Desc: A traditional table for people to have dinner at.

Text.Name: WaterTank
Text.Desc: A container for storing and cleansing water. It can be very convenient to have somewhere that requires the frequent usage of water.

Text.Name: SmallPool
Text.Desc: A pool made from Fire Copper and Ice Crystal with a Fortune Seed as its core. It can gradually improve the quality of the surrounding earth.

Text.Name: StreetLight
Text.Desc: A decorative light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: StreetLight1
Text.Desc: A decorative light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: StreetLight2
Text.Desc: A decorative light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: Lantern
Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: Lantern_S1
Text.Desc: A light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: Candlestick
Text.Desc: A light often used indoors that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.

Text.Name: TicTacToe
Text.Desc: Requires no materials, just an empty area on the ground to play tic-tac-toe on.

Text.Name: GoTable
Text.Desc: A short Go table with a 19x19 grid for two people to play a great game of Go on.

Text.Name: GuzhengTable
Text.Desc: A table with a Chinese Zither on it that can be played by one person.

Text.Name: CalligraphyTable
Text.Desc: A table with writing brushes, ink sticks, paper and inkstones on it that can be used to draw talismans. Besides this, it can also be used for leisure purposes.

Text.Name: CageShelf
Text.Desc: A beautifully made bird cage for people who keep birds and insects.

Text.Name: Building_Tomb
Text.Desc: A simple place of burial for the dead.

Text.Name: Building_BigTomb
Text.Desc: A place of burial for the dead.
